sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter sent to the Hono[ra]ble William Lenthal Esq. speaker of the Honorable House of Commons : concerning Sir Thomas Fairfax's rovting of the enemy in the West, neer Bodman, March 8, 1645 : together with the Lord Hoptons answer to Sir Thomas Fairfax's summons. Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.
8 p.
Printed for Edw. Husband ... and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : March 12, 1645 [1646]
Signed at end: J.R. [i.e. John Rushworth] Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
A letter sent to the Hono[ra]ble William Lenthal Esq. speaker of the Honorable House of Commons : concerning Sir Thomas Fairfax's rovting of the enemy in the West, neer Bodman, March 8, 1645 : together with the Lord Hoptons answer to Sir Thomas Fairfax's summons. Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.
8 p.
Printed for Edw. Husband ... and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : March 12, 1645 [1646]
Signed at end: J.R. [i.e. John Rushworth] Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Edw. Husband
his shop
